title: Yegor Azyava
text:
Yegor Vladimirovich Azyava (; born 8 March 1983) is a former <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian and <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
Club career.
He was born and started his career in <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>. He moved to <a href="Sakhalin">Sakhalin</a> in 2007 and later accepted <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n citizenship.
